register.title: Register
register.subtitle: Already registered?
register.success: Please, check your email to complete your registration
register.error: We are having problems while attempting to create your account
register.input_description_password: Must have at least {{ min }} characters and at most {{ max }}.

home.title: Home
home.no_property_added: We couldn't find a property associated with your account. Add one to start managing it.

condominium/add.title: Add Condominium
condominium/add.input_description_relationship_type: Defines which functions you will have access to
condominium/add.input_validation_name_required: Enter a valid condominium name, like Galaxy Towers
condominium/add.input_validation_id_required: Enter a valid condominium Id, like 432b4b02-7443-42a2-bae1-b888e7ccf5d0

condominium/admin/commonArea/add.input_description_time_interval: Enter the duration of each reservation, in the format hh:mm
condominium/admin/commonArea/add.input_validation_time_interval_step_mism: Enter a interval with increments of {{ step }}, like {{ examples }}
condominium/admin/commonArea/add.input_validation_time_interval_range_und: Enter a interval of at least {{ min }}
condominium/admin/commonArea/add.fieldset_description_facilities: Add facilities to this common area. Reservations are made for each facility. A facility can be the common area itself, part of it or some device that needs booking before use.
condominium/admin/commonArea/add.fieldset_description_facilities_gym_exam: Facility 1: Gym Block B; Facility 2: Gym Block C
condominium/admin/commonArea/add.fieldset_description_facilities_laundry_: Facility 1: Washing machine 1; Facility 2: Washing machine 2
condominium/admin/commonArea/add.input_validation_name_en_required: Enter a valid name in English, like Gym Block B
condominium/admin/commonArea/add.input_validation_name_ptbr_required: Enter a valid name in Portuguese (Brazil), like Academia Bloco B

occurrences/[id].modal_description_deleteOccurrence: Are you sure? this action is irreversible!

commonAreas/[id]/booking.input_description_date: Enter a date between {{ from }} and {{ to }}

error.not_authorized_to_perform_action: You're not authorized to perform this action
error.failed_to_stablish_connection_with_serve: Could not stablish connection with server

validation.input_validation_email_required: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@exemple.com
validation.input_validation_email_required_withoutE: Enter an email address in the correct format
validation.input_validation_phone_required: Enter a valid phone number, like (00) 0000-0000

validation.input_validation_password_tooLongPlural: Password must have at most {{ count }} caracteres
